SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
APIClient
APIClient class handles the interaction with external APIs to fetch course recommendations based on user interests.
Application
Main application class for the Course Recommender.
ComboBox
A custom multi-select ComboBox implementation for selecting multiple items.
Counselor
The `Counselor` class represents a counselor with a name and email.
Course
The Course class represents a course within the system, providing functionality for managing course prerequisites, fulfilling graduation requirements, and tracking courses per grade level.
Course.FileCourseData
A helper class to represent the course data in JSON format.
CourseAssembly
The CourseAssembly class is responsible for managing course data, including recommending courses based on user input, reading credentials, and running course assessments.
CreateAccount
A class responsible for creating user accounts.
CreateAccount.AccountCreationStatus
Enum representing the status of account creation.
DashboardForm
DashboardForm represents the main dashboard interface for a user.
Deployment
The Deployment interface defines a contract for running an API-related task.
DynamicFormLoader
The DynamicFormLoader class is responsible for dynamically loading and instantiating form classes based on the provided question number and user responses.
EditButtonListener
Listener for handling edit button functionality for editing and saving course data.
EmailUtil
The `EmailUtil` class provides utility methods for validating email addresses and checking email registrations.
EncryptionUtil
Utility class for handling encryption, decryption, and code verification logic.
ExcelUtility
Utility class for handling course data stored in an Excel file.
FillCourses
The FillCourses class represents a panel in the GUI where the user can input additional interests for courses.
ForgotPasswordForm
This class represents the Forgot Password form UI, allowing users to reset their password by entering their email.
ForgotPasswordUtil
A utility class for handling the "Forgot Password" functionality.
Form1
Form1 represents a panel that displays the first question -- selecting a grade
Form2
Form2 represents a panel that displays the second question -- selecting a education path
Form3
Form3 represents a panel that displays the third question -- typing interests
Form4
Form4 represents a panel that displays the fourth question -- typing a future career
Form5
Form5 represents a panel that displays the fifth question -- selecting previous courses
FormsManager
Manages the display of forms within the application, ensuring a smooth transition with animations using FlatLaf's animation features.
JsonToPdfConverter
This class provides functionality to generate a PDF document from a JSON file containing recommended course information.
JsonUtil
Utility class for reading and writing JSON data related to users and courses.
LoginForm
Represents the login form in the GUI application.
NotificationManager
Manages the display of notifications with different types and ensures cooldown periods between consecutive notifications of the same type.
NotificationManager.NotificationType
Enum representing the types of notifications that can be displayed.
PageMenuIndicator
A custom component that visually indicates the current page number and completed pages in a multi-page interface.
PasswordChangeForm
This class represents a form for changing a user's password.
PasswordStrengthStatus
PasswordStrengthStatus is a custom JPanel that visually displays the strength of a password entered in a JPasswordField.
PythonAPI
The PythonAPI class implements the Deployment interface and provides functionality to run a Python script as an external process from a Java application.
RegisterForm
The RegisterForm class represents a user registration form in the GUI.
SendEmail
This class handles the functionality for sending emails related to the Course Recommender system.
StudentCounselor
The abstract class `StudentCounselor` is responsible for managing the mapping of student last names to their respective counselor information.
TwoFactorAuthentication
A utility class for handling Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) functionality.
User
Represents a user account with personal information such as username, password, email, first name, and last name.
UserInput
The UserInput class represents the information inputted by the user (student), including their interests, previous courses, grade level, track, and username.
UsersUtil
Utility class for managing and retrieving user information.
VerificationForm
A panel that represents the verification form for entering a 6-digit verification code.
